org.javautil.hibernate.persist
Class DaoImpl<T extends Serializable,ID extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  org.javautil.hibernate.persist.BaseDao<T,ID>
      org.javautil.hibernate.persist.DaoImpl<T,ID>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dao<T,ID>
public class DaoImpl<T extends Serializable,ID extends Serializable>
extends BaseDao<T,ID>
implements Dao<T,ID>

Common DAO implementation. Usage: 1) retrieve userDao from application context, where it has session factory injected. 2) instantiate other DAOs: DmDomain domainDao = new DaoImpl(DmDomain.class);

Author:
tim@softwareMentor.com
